attributes.action: We demand the right to use clean showers around the country during these times!
attributes.additional_details: The government need to find a way for us truck drivers to use clean Facilities during these times as this Coronavirus situation could last many months.
attributes.background: Motorway Service stations around the country have now refused drivers the right to use showers, this is completely unfair as we are key workers and if people can’t clean themselves properly, people start developing problems with there skin.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, most service stations are now providing access to shower facilities. 

Decisions for individual service stations are for their operators, and not for the UK Government or Parliament.
